overview.name: Foxconn
overview.description: Foxconn internationally, is a Taiwanese multinational electronics contract manufacturer established in 1974. Knowledge of the exact Amazon Echo Dot supply chain is limited, but Amazon is known to use Foxconn for its products.

location.address:
No. 2, Zihyou Street, Tucheng District,
New Taipei City 236,
Taiwan (R.O.C.)

overview.name: Pegatron
overview.description: Pegatron is Taiwan based worldwide leading DMS (Design, manufacturing, service) company. Featuring a solid professional R&D team, with abundant product development experience, we provides customers the most innovative designs. We work on a broad category of products, including PC (laptops, rugged devices, AI edge computing, servers), consumer electronics, car electronics, IoT electronics, smartphone, network devices. Knowledge of the exact Amazon Echo Dot supply chain is limited, but Amazon is known to use Pegatron for its products.

location.address:
No.108, Sec. 2, Zhongqing Rd., Beitou Dist.,
Taipei City 112, Taiwan (R.O.C.)

overview.name: Texas Instruments
overview.description: Texas Instruments Incorporated (TI) is an American technology company headquartered in Dallas, Texas, that designs and manufactures semiconductors and various integrated circuits, which it sells to electronics designers and manufacturers globally. Texas Instruments has five chips -- including a digital media processor -- inside at least one version of the Echo Dot.

location.address:
Texas Instruments
12500 TI Boulevard
Dallas, Texas 75243
United States of America

overview.name: Infineon
overview.description: Infineon Technologies AG is a German semiconductor manufacturer founded in 1999. Infineon likely provides audio amplifier chips for a version of the Echo Dot.

location.address:
Infineon Technologies AG
Am Campeon 1-12
85579 Neubiberg
Germany

overview.name: Knowles
overview.description: Knowles is a market leader and global provider of advanced micro-acoustic microphones and speakers, audio processing, and precision device solutions, serving the consumer electronics, communications, medtech, defense, electric vehicle, and industrial markets. Knowles likely provides microphones for a version of the Echo dot.

location.address:
Knowles Corporation
1151 Maplewood Drive
Itasca, IL 60143
United States of America

overview.name: Best Buy
overview.description: Best Buy is an American multinational consumer electronics retailer. They carry many Amazon products, one of which being the Echo Dot.

overview.name: Amazon Headquarters
overview.description: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. They created the Echo Dot.

overview.name: Amazon Lab126
overview.description: Amazon Lab126, sometimes known as Lab126, is an American research and development and computer hardware company owned by Amazon.com. This office is where many employees involved in the development of the Echo Dot do their work.

overview.name: Costco Wholesale
overview.description: Costco is a members-only warehouse selling a huge variety of items including bulk groceries, electronics & more. They claim to carry the Echo Dot.

location.address: 3250 VERNON BLVD, LONG ISLAND CITY, NY 11106
